order by

mapper.insert:
select CRS_ATTEMP_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into CRS_ATTEMP (ID, USER_ID, COURSE_ID, SCO_ID, RAW_STATUS, EXIT_MODE, ENTRY_STATUS, RAW_SCORE, SCORE_MAX, SCORE_MIN, SESSION_TIME, LESSON_LOCATION, LESSON_MODE, SUSPEND_DATA, RECORD_STATUS, UPDATE_COUNT, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{courseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rawStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{exitMode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{entryStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{rawScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scoreMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scoreMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sessionTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lessonLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lessonMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suspendData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
